segments.text: I do have one problem with the apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t like all those stains in the carpet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will have the carpet cleaned before you move into the apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I assure you that we will , and if there are any more problems , feel free to tell me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That was the only thing that I saw wrong with the apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m glad to know that you think the apartment is so nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s absolutely incredible . I ’ ll take it .
segments.speaker: S2
